Package model.game

Class Blackjack

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.AbstractListenableModel
      • model.game.Blackjack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, BlackjackInterface, ListenableModel, ModelListener
    public class Blackjack
extends AbstractListenableModel
implements ModelListener, BlackjackInterface, java.lang.Runnable
    Class Blackjack Model representing the blackjack game A blackjack is composed by a dealer and player each taking card from a deck of cards
